Author: Nihilistic_Asshole_9
Text: This is my logic. I'm in a cycle of restricting very low during the week and then binging my brains out on the weekend. So far I've averaged 1230kcal all week give or take ~50 and my stomach is flatter, I've lost the water weight and feel less bingey.

Author: lemonye
Text: Lol Ive held a 200-500 deficit for almost 3 months and I'm so bored, it's testing my patience for sure. But the good part is I'm not binging and I'm not starving
